page.title: 08The Blacksmith
page.content: The{Blacksmith}opens every Tuesday morning about 8,Oclock.A horse needs a{change of shoes about}every six weeks. At the moment Mr. Toogood has two people to help him. They shoe about{10 to 15 horses a day. It takes roughly an hour to shoe one horse. The building has always been a{forge,}and when Mr.Toogood moved in there were {hand bellows}instead of electric. But soon after he moved in he changed to an electric fan. The{blacksmith's shop}was built in 185O.Mr.Toogood was the first member of his family to be a blacksmith but now he hopes to build the business up for his family.
